mapper.select: SELECT `id` AS `id`, `user_id` AS `userId`, `bank_name` AS `bankName`, `account_number` AS `accountNumber`, `account_owner` AS `accountOwner`, `created_at` AS `createdAt`, `is_deleted` AS `isDeleted` FROM `kream`.`account` WHERE `account`.`user_id` = #{userId} AND `account`.`is_deleted` = 0
